topicSummary: Hand, foot, and mouth disease (HFMD) is an acute viral illness characterized by vesicular eruptions in the mouth and papulovesicular skin lesions

topicHtmlObjects.htmlHeader: Hand foot and mouth disease: Summary

latestChanges.title: Reviewed
latestChanges.body: A literature search was conducted in October 2015 to identify evidence-based guidelines, UK policy, systematic reviews, and key randomized controlled trials published since the last revision of this topic. No major changes to recommendations have been made.
